column1: '''Calenhad''' was the penultimate [[Warning beacons of Gondor|beacon-hill]] of [[Gondor]]
column2: being the sixth from east to west and located to south-east of [[Firienholt]].

column1: Calenhad is described as being a small
column3: treeless hill which was slightly bigger and taller than [[Erelas]].<ref name="VT">{{VT|42a}}
column4: pp. 19-20</ref> Calenhad was seldom lit and its lighting during the [[War of the Ring]] indicated great urgency.

column1: On the night of [[7 March]] {{TA|3019}} [[Gandalf]] and [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]]
column3: saw the beacons being lit to call for aid from [[Rohan]].<ref>{{RK|MT}}</ref>
